mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( user_id, user_name, user_mail, extension, reg_dt, active ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_mail}, #{extension}, now(), 'y' )
mapper.select: SELECT user_no, user_id, user_name, user_mail, extension, reg_dt, active FROM user WHERE user_id=#{user_id} and user_name=#{user_name} and user_mail=#{user_mail} and extension=#{extension}
